Data Fields
display_palette_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Display

Display Palette Attributes. More...

#include <display.h>

Detailed Description

The display palette converts the bits_per_pixel to a native color. For example, if there are two bits per pixel, the display driver can handle 4 colors. The palette defines how those four colors are mapped to the display.

Data Fields

u8 pixel_format
 
u8 count
 
u16 pixel_size
 
void * colors
 

Field Documentation

void* display_palette_t::colors

A pointer to the colors in the palette

u8 display_palette_t::count

The number of pixel entries in the palette

u8 display_palette_t::pixel_format

Pixel format of the display (e.g. DISPLAY_PALETTE_ATTR_PIXEL_FORMAT_RGB565)

u16 display_palette_t::pixel_size

The number of bytes in a palette entry
